The Sept. 26 theme is "Islamic Peace and Tolerance Day," and according to the release, it will include remarks from Geller, who regularly espouses anti-Islamic views and once said President Obama "will do nothing but beat up on our friends to appease his Islamic overlords."
Prince, the founder of now defunct military contractor Blackwater who has recently been advocating for private contractors to be sent to Afghanistan instead of U.S. troops, will also speak.
